page_content: The page discusses an SMS alert system for flood warnings around Bielersee.
The page provides information on tax deductions related to private vehicle use for commuting.
The page discusses the taxation of various types of pensions received from occupational provision schemes.
The page outlines tax filing requirements for individuals with properties or businesses in Kanton Bern but residing in another canton.
The page provides information about the 7th and 8th stages of the Tour de Suisse 2007, including road closures and traffic advisories.
